Getting help with IDEEA

Source: vignettes/articles/help.Rmd
help.Rmd

Convenstions

Due to the multi-lingual nature of the IDEEA repository with scripts written in R, Python, Julia, and GAMS, we have adopted the following conventions for naming objects and functions: - Names of functions and data objects - Names of the model objects (‘technologies’, ‘regions’, ‘commodities’, etc.)

IDEEA R-package help

  • functions
  • data
